author: donschoe
content: In a way, mainnet is the incentivized testnet.

author: superphiz
content: I've been committed to this worldview since the moment I heard it.

author: pieterastra
content: ETH2 phase 0 is a testnet in all but name - no smart contracts, no withdrawals, just a large scale incentivized test for the PoS beacon chain

author: alex.eth
content: I think that's good... actually adding the word "testnet" to it wouldn't be appropriate since real value is at stake.

author: pieterastra
content:
Yes, that could rub people the wrong way.
And phase 0 is still a big step and technological achievement in its own right
